data.name: Prophet
data.detailed_description:
Long after the last war, a knight must reclaim his charge and discover a new purpose.

- The "Souls-like" experience distilled down to its core essence
- fast paced stamina based combat
- exploration tempered by real danger
- a universe cloaked in mystery, waiting to be discovered
- cinematic storytelling
- an ancient tale retold

data.short_description: Long after the last war a knight must reclaim his charge and discover a new purpose in Prophet! Experience a forgotten world of myth and machines. Explore vast caverns, fight the remnants of a dead faith, and befriend those who have found a way to move on, all in a beautifully rendered 3d action RPG
